code: export const getUserData=()=>{const storedUserData=localStorage.getItem('userData');if(storedUserData!==undefined)return storedUserData?JSON.parse(storedUserData):null;};export const isUserAuthenticated=()=>{var _getUserData;return((_getUserData=getUserData())===null||_getUserData===void 0?void 0:_getUserData.User)!==undefined;};export const unAuntification=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('userData');};
